name: STYLE_SELECT_ARROW
code:
export const STYLE_SELECT_ARROW = lyl `{
  &::after {
    position: absolute
    content: ''
    width: 0
    height: 0
    border-left: 0.3125em solid transparent
    border-right: 0.3125em solid transparent
    border-top: 0.3125em solid
    top: 50%
    {after}: 0
    margin-top: -0.15625em
    pointer-events: none
  }
}`;
